value: Fixed-angle volar plates provide stable fixation for corrective osteotomies of the distal radius and might be a safer alternative to conventional fixation methods.
comment: The summary of the findings about fixed-angle volar plates correcting malunions of dorsally angulated distal radius fractures. The study found the plates provide a stable fixation and may be a safer alternative to conventional fixation methods.
